snippet.title: Jordan Hall - A Deeper Dive Into Discernment
snippet.description:
Discernment is one of the keystones in the building of effective, stable, resilient collective intelligence. In this video Jordan goes into much greater depth on the topic, offering his insights as to not only what it is and how to improve it, but also what some of the common pitfalls and barriers are likely to be.
I believe we have managed to cover some new ground here; certainly I am much more aware of what a challenging and potentially rewarding endeavour the development of discernment is, and have taken away some what I believe will be useful and practical suggestions for doing so.


Links to the videos I referenced in the introduction, along with John Vervaeke's excellent series, "awakening from the meaning crisis", are below:

John Vervaeke's meaning crisis series:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLND1JCRq8Vuh3f0P5qjrSdb5eC1ZfZwWJ

Paradox of the times
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_SmGMJzWHK4

Making sense of sensemaking 
3 way emergent conversation between Jordan Hall, Daniel Schmachtenberger and Jamie Wheal
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Es_WTEgZHE
